title: Unlocking the value of food waste: sustainable production of ethylene glycol over low-cost Ni–W catalysts supported on glucose-derived carbons
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00823E, Paper
Lucília Sousa Ribeiro, Rafael Gomes Morais, José Joaquim de Melo Órfão, Manuel Fernando Ribeiro Pereira
Low-cost Ni–W catalysts supported on glucose-based carbons were efficient for the sustainable ethylene glycol production directly from cellulose and wastes.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
